import React, { useState, forwardRef } from "react"; import styles from "./Footer.module.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Footer = forwardRef((props, ref) => { const history = useHistory(); const isLoggedIn = useSelector((state) => state.login.isLoggedIn); const user = useSelector((state) => state.login.user); const [emailInput, setEmailInput] = useState(isLoggedIn && user && user.email? user.email : "" ); const onEmailChange = (e) => { setEmailInput(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(user); // history.push("/login"); }; return (
